attributes.action: Ability to optionally register to a Doctor near your place of work
attributes.additional_details:
Many work hours are lost due to employees being limited to registering to a Doctor's Surgery near their place of residence.  When an appointment is required time must often be taken off work far beyond the limit of the appointment when transport is an issue.

A great deal of work hours would be saved, and a great deal of personal convenience gained, if employees were permitted to optionally register to a Doctor's Surgery near their place of work or register to a Surgery near their residence.

It should be noted that registering at two Surgeries at the same time is not being suggested only the option to register at the Surgery that one has the greatest ability to access.
